1�The shared memories of generations of mooglekind flood into your mind, granting you the ability to decipher the cryptic glyphs of your 3????...

1�Review which trial?Trial 
�.Trial 
.Trial 
.Trial

.Trial 
.Trial 
 .Trial 
	.Moogle's Almanack.Return.
1�You open the tome to the ??Moogle's Almanack?? chapter and peruse its weather prognostication pages.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ????.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ????. There is also the possibility of ????, so caution is in order.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with a chance of ????.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with occasional ????. There is also a slight chance of ????, so caution is in order.
1�Predicting ahead, tomorrow's weather looks to be ????.
1�Predicting ahead, tomorrow's weather looks to be ????. There is also the possibility of ????, so caution is in order.
1�Predicting ahead, tomorrow's weather looks to be ???? with a chance of ????.
1�Predicting ahead, tomorrow's weather looks to be ???? with occasional ????. There is also a slight chance of ????, so caution is in order.
1�Finally, the forecast for the day after tomorrow calls for ????.
1�Finally, the forecast for the day after tomorrow calls for ????. There is also the possibility of ????, so caution is advised.
1�Finally, the forecast for the day after tomorrow calls for ???? with a chance of ????.
1�Finally, the forecast for the day after tomorrow calls for ???? with occasional ????. There is also a slight chance of ????, so caution is in order.

1�You are also a wielder of the scythe? And quite a skilled one, I dare say. Though it may not appear likely, I, too, have some small ability with that weapon. I actually have quite a collection of scythes.

1�One of the scythes I possess has a decidedly ominous aura. ??Cursed?? is the only way I can describe it. A perfectly sane person who takes up this scythe begins to act in the most unusual manner...

1�It is said, however, that if the curse on the scythe can be overcome by the heat of many battles, the wielder gains the knowledge of a new weapon technique. What say you? Are you up to the challenge?
1�Excellent. Here is the weapon.When the curse has been lifted, the scythe will lose its power. Bring it back to me when this happens and I will see if the blight has truly been cleansed.
1�Take care not to lose yourself to the curse...
1�If that's the case, perhaps it would be better if you forgot we ever had this conversation...
1�You have done splendidly. However, there is still one thing that remains to be done.
1�You must excuse me. My supply of medicine has run dry and I'm not in the best of shape these days.
1�What caused my condition, you ask?
1�I was once forced to undergo battle training in a certain place. It was there I was given a potion to drink that reduced me to this pitiful state...
1�I spent days on end in blackness, on the brink of losing my very sense of self. I finally managed to crawl out of that darkness with my sanity intact, but my companions are still...
1�Enough of this talk. Your final trial awaits you. If this test is not completed, your effort until this point will have been for naught.
1�Journey to the Den of Rancor with this 3???? and obtain the 3????. When you have bound the evil in the scythe, your exertions will be at an end.
1�I will hold the #???? here for your return. My prayers go with you...
1�You still need to cleanse the scythe in several more battles before the curse's influence is removed. Be sure the curse does not find a new home in you.
1�Was there something else?I lost the #????...This curse has bested me.No, sorry to disturb you.
1�What is your decision?I can go no further.I will persevere.
1�How goes it? If you wish to know if the curse has been removed, then let me see the #????. Or perhaps there was something else you wished to discuss?

1�Strangely enough, I just came into possession of another such scythe. I would advise against handing these weapons around to your compatriots, though. They are not toys to be played with, my friend.
1�Naturally, you must begin the process of removing the curse anew. A lack of focus can cost you dearly. Please do be careful this time.

1�I agree that this is a dangerous feat to attempt, but I believe that you have the strength of spirit to prevail. If you persevere until the end, your reward will be great. Do you still wish to give up?
1�If you feel your resolve crumbling, then you are right to end your attempt here.
1�I advise you to rest for a time to cleanse your spirit of evil influences. Dispose of the scythe and do not pass it on to anyone else.
1�That is good. But do not let your focus waver, or the curse will gain hold of you. Take care, my friend.
1�Journey to the Den of Rancor with this 3???? and obtain the 3????. When you have bound the evil in the scythe, your exertions will be at an end.
1�I knew you would return victorious. Another soul...ah, another scythe has been freed from its curse. You have my gratitude.
1�Thank you, Brugaire. Here is your usual fee.
1�I was under the impression that the Brugaire Consortium respected the privacy of its customers. Was I mistaken?
1�I feel I can tell you the truth of my situation.
1�Do you remember how I spoke of being forced to undergo battle training at a certain place?
1�The ones that captured me were shadows. Surely you have seen them? Those undead creatures that resemble Elvaan?
1�They kidnap young children, who are made to drink a vile potion while learning the arts of war. Eventually the children become shadows themselves. That is how they increase their numbers.
1�Have you heard the tales of Elvaan children disappearing from the Kingdom? This is the work of the shadows.
1�Hard to believe? I know it to be true, for I was one of those children...
1�The shadows that roam the darkness today were once my friends, abducted as I was. When the transformation into shadow is complete, all sense of self is lost. My companions no longer recognize me.
1�To release their souls from damnation, I shun the sun's rays and hunt shadows in this perpetual night. This scythe is their salvation.
1�I escaped that blackest night once, only to find a deeper kind of darkness waiting for me in the form of despair. Perhaps this is my penance for being the sole survivor.
1�I cannot blame people for thinking I am some kind of vampire. I see my own actions as monstrous.
1�But I care not for other people's opinions; I merely do what I must. To grant their souls peace by my own hand...I owe my companions that, at least.
1�My entire existence is here in the darkness.
1�Whenever you release the soul of a shadow, I ask that you whisper a prayer for them:
1�??May your next life be bathed in bless?hd light...??
1�Cyranuce? No, you'll not find him here. He is dead. His cellmate was a beastmaster, who somehow called forth a terrible creature and fled.
1�If you wish to learn of dragons, ask the archeologist, Oiheaurese, in the cathedral. He should know well their lore.
1�If you wish to learn of dragons, ask the archeologist, Oiheaurese, in the cathedral. He should know well their lore.
1�Those without business here should be on their way. That means you.
1�So you will bring me  $????? Please then, make haste.
1�Do you believe the rumors?Yes, I do.Never!
1�You do me a great service. It is hard to find such a helper. I thank you.
1�You've...heard about me? That I am some sort of blood-sucker...a freak of nature? And of course, you'd believe them...everyone does.
1�Never mind... You seem to be a kind soul, so I will tell you. I have a disease.
1�Whenever the light of the sun touches my skin, it burns me in a horrible fashion.
1�I was poisoned, long ago... That is how I became this way. And I have been trying to find a cure, some kind of serum, ever since.
1�After many experiments, I found that these %???? are the only things that ease my pain.
1�Yes, I've become quite knowledgeable in the ways of poisons. People still shun me, but I do not blame them.
1�The people of San d'Oria can see only with their own eyes, never another's. They think their own view superior to all.
1�But you, my friend, are different. If there is anything I can do, you need but ask me.
1�Here, take this. It is not much, but it is all I have. I give you my thanks.
1�Accept Novalmauge's request?Accept.Turn him down.
1�Listen to him?Hear what he has to say.No way.
1�Accept Novalmauge's request?Accept.Turn him down.
1�Eh? What? You'll take my request?
1�That is good news, indeed. I want you to bring me  $????, and as fast as you can.
1�Ah. I see. Don't mind me, then.
1�If you have a moment, will you hear my request?
1�Ah. I see. Don't mind me, then.
1�I want you to bring me  $????.
1�Just...don't ask me why. How about it?Will you do this for me?
1�Ah...ah-hah. That is to be expected, I guess. Sorry to ask such a ludicrous favor! Don't worry yourself about it.
1�That is good news, indeed. Please hurry, I beg you.
1�This dungeon has a dark past, especially the deepest room. There are many strange tales about it, yes...
1�I wouldn't be surprised if you were the one to uncover the truth.
1�Eh? Someone threw poison in the water by the sluice gate? You want me to make a neutralizer, then?
1�I prefer to avoid goings-on of this sort, but I cannot refuse a request from you after what you have done for me. All right, I will see what I can do!
1�Bring me  $????. We can use it to make a neutralizer that should put things to rights...I hope.
1�Bring me  $????. We can use it to make a neutralizer that should put things to rights...I hope.
1�You've brought me  $????? Excellent! Now, I need a little time.
1�There! With this all will be well. Of course, it saddens me to hear this sort of thing still goes on up there. After all this time, they haven't changed.
1�His beast knocked a gaping hole in the wall, so he was home free. But Cyranuce's body was found underneath the creature. It's too bad... We could've saved him if we got here sooner!
1�What!? Lies, all of it!
1�No, it can't be!
1�Why, you--!
1�In past times, it was said that nobles accused of treason were thrown down there.They would wander for days through the maze of sewer tunnels, until they would finally collapse from starvation.
1�Now terrible beasts prowl through the darkness. If you have the courage, you may enter.
1�As long as I get my money I don't much care, but what the hell are you doing with this thing? I've never seen anyone blunt a blade so quickly.
1�Good grief, man. I'm not trying to grill you, I was just curious.

1�Well, I don't want to invade your privacy any longer, so I'll just get out of here, shall I? You oughta give a little thought to your reputation outside of your little world here. You're not exactly Mister Popular up in town.
1�I'll be seeing you.
1�Yeah, I know.
1�Rahal was jealous of his friend Cyranuce for becoming a dragoon. He set a trap for him, and saw him thrown into this very dungeon.
1�That is how Rahal, the dragonslayer tainted with drakes' blood, seized the office of general. You knights were left in the dark.
1�Lies? Well then, why was Rahal always coming to check on him? He was waiting for Cyranuce to kick the bucket, wasn't he?
1�Hmph. The only people who can become dragonslayers are those who truly hate them. They're not after treasure or jewels; they just want to exterminate them!
1�What do ya think you're lookin' at?You don't know nothing about what's really going on under this hellhole do ya?Compared to the sewers, my cell is a palace!
1�Oh yeah, I think I heard about some scientists who ran off into the sewers during the war. They say only one got out, but that he was messed up in the head for the rest of his life.
1�Rumor has it that there's a way out of there. Maybe the old guy got lucky.
1�What do ya think you're lookin' at?You don't know nothing about what's really going on under this hellhole do ya?Compared to the sewers, my cell is a palace!
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Rumor(pt.1).The Rumor(pt.2).Trouble at the Sluice.The Holy Crest.Souls in Shadow(pt.1).Souls in Shadow(pt.2).Souls in Shadow(pt.3).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Boo-hah-hah?`...kupo!
1�Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!
1�Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!
1�Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!
1�Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...
1�This place is crawling with nasties.You should probably head back to town so you can testify to your partner's bravery.
1�Boo-hah-hah?`...kupo!
1�Why do ghosts say ??boo,?? anyway?
1�I heard that going to a dark, scary dungeon is the best way to test your courage.This place definitely qualifies, kupo!
1�Maybe I'm doing something wrong, kupo?
1�If it gets out that I haven't scared the wits out of a single person yet, I'm going to get into trouble, kupo...
1�Boo-hah-hah?`...kupo!
1�Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!
1�Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!
1�Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!
1�Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...

1�Once-in-a-lifetime meetings make for wonderful stories, but no treasure can compare to being part of a group of friends you can call home.
1�Linkshell concierges such as myself bring together adventurers of similar interests.
1�In a word, we match adventurers looking for linkshells with those linkshells interested in taking in new members.
1�I accept %???? from linkshells the world over and distribute them to appropriate adventurers.
1�This service is provided by the Adventurers' Mutual Aid Network, and as such, anyone working for Vana'diel's greater good is eligible to participate.
1�Additionally, please be aware that I am only able to offer you one #???? per day.

1�It is worth noting that each concierge may only register a maximum of 
� linkshells.
1�Once the number of registrations has hit the limit, existing registrations will be canceled in order of oldest to newest.
1�?Server maintenances will also immediately cancel all registrations, so be sure to keep your information up-to-dat
1�A manual describing proper chat manners floats in front of you.

1�Perhaps consider starting with a simple greeting. Something like...
1�??Hello, everyone. My name's  . Nice to meet you!??
1�Of course, injecting your own personal flavor may act as a conversation starter and help people to remember you.
1�No matter which route you choose, make sure to always remain polite. There is no better way to start a friendship off on the right foot.
1�When speaking with others, it's critical to listen and be mindful of what they say.
1�Always talking and never listening may come across as rude.
1�Another important point is to always be mindful of the listener. How would you feel if someone said that to you? Think carefully before sending someone a message.
1�It also helps to be clear and concise.
1�Being vague might cause others to get the wrong impression.
1�Be extremely careful when giving out personal information such as your address or telephone number.
1�Furthermore, refrain from making disparaging or aggressive remarks.
1�Once you are close to someone, you may be more comfortable letting your hair down, but it is strongly recommended that you refrain from any actions that may be construed as harassment.
1�After joining a linkshell, you may find that you have difficulty participating in conversation or that your personality is too different from the other members.
1�One of your options in such a situation is to inform the linkshell leader and then leave.
1�Finding a linkshell that is the perfect fit might not always be easy, but there is certainly a group out there that will match your feelings and goals.
1�Once you find those kinds of friends, hold them fast and value them as much as they value you. There is no better way to enjoy life in Vana'diel.
